answers.answer: sorry to hear about your fall and your cancer as well, hope all is well in that area.personally, i would go to a dr and at least have them x-ray you to make sure nothing is broken. if nothing shows as broken, if you arent any better...or worsen, within id say 3-4 weeks after that, then i would request an MRI.  hate to hear this...hope you get to feeling better soon. sounds like youve been through enough at your young age!

question: 3 days ago I took a bad spill while showering I slipped and fell out of the shower,  my feet went out from under me I landed outside of the tub-shower on tile floor flat on my back, ma having pain from shoulder to shoulder & neck to mid back.  A little history on my health age 46 female  carcinoid cancer patient 3 masses in liver , original cancer removed  type 2 diabetes.
title: fall
